title: Identify High-Risk Patients
description: A population health analyst needs to identify diabetic patients who are at high risk for hospital readmission.

tasks.description: Open the population health analytics platform.
Create a cohort of all patients with a diagnosis of diabetes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of all diabetic patients in the population.

tasks.description: Apply a risk stratification model to the cohort to identify patients with the highest readmission risk scores.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system produces a prioritized list of high-risk patients who should be targeted for care management interventions.
